head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CARROLL, EDWARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CARROLL, EDWARD J.

block.p: CARROLL--Edward J., on April 30, 2007. Veteran, United States Navy WWII. President of the former E. J. Carroll Studio, Fifth Avenue, Manhattan. Master Illuminator commissioned by the Vatican and the White House. Beloved husband of the late Rita Hoban. Devoted and cherished father of Mary Clavin (Peter). Proud grandfather of Joseph, Matthew, Stephen and Amy Clavin. Also survived by many loving nieces and nephews. Visiting Tuesday, 79pm and Wednesday 2-4 and 7-9pm at Clavin Funeral Home, 7722 Fourth Avenue, Brooklyn. Mass of Christian Burial Thursday, 10am at St. Anselm R.C. Church, Brooklyn. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation, 120 Wall Street, 19th Floor, NY, NY 10005.
